Direct Known Subclasses:
MapOutputCollector, ReduceOutputCollector
public abstract class OutputCollector<K extends java.io.Serializable,V extends java.io.Serializable>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

OutputCollector is pass into Mappers and Reducers. It allows for the application programmer to output the results

Author:
keweiz, rajagarw

collect

public abstract void collect(K key,
                             V value)
                      throws java.io.IOException,
                             java.lang.InstantiationException,
                             java.lang.IllegalAccessException
A method that takes in a key value from the map/reduce output and writes it too file. This method needs to be called by the client's code to make sure that the output of their functions can be processed.

value -

Get's the number of entries that were collected

getFileMeta

public FileMeta getFileMeta()
Returns a fileMeta representation of the collected keyvals. This should be called only after the map/reduce phase is done.
